post.body: I love Sainsburys. It's great for keeping the riff raff out of Waitrose ;0P
"The RSC stresses that it in running the competition it does not condone the fictional bullion heist" That's made my day, ta.
didn't Michael Caine say they ran the engine, thus emptied the fuel tanks, lightened the load and excaped but the coach fell?
If I want a headrush nowadays I can just stand up unexpectedly
Ay well, it used to take a lot of effort to reach my now normal state of befuddlement you know.
I saw what was on tellie this evening and reached for the bookcase
Is that some sort of reality tv gubbins?
Non-personal public data should be available to public as default. Make that data available through APIs. Encourages creativity.
If Govt're going to use Keynesian pump priming to spend out of recession surely some of that should go on Next Generation Access
No traffic shaping? Why ever not?
I thought that as well. They mean that we can make an enquiry not submit to an inquiry. Relieved am not the only autistic pedant.
mullet
muchas gracis.
Thanks. I'm guessing that I can sub chicken stock for veg no probs. Might give it a go at the weekend.
are you available for children's parties?
Ta for that, was lying on couch feeling very lazy. Now, who wants to come round and cook for me then?
Ta v muchly. What is this "full" RSS that you speak of though?
Here http://www.karmadillos.com/ tel no is 442 . Spontanaeity of the joke kind of lost now though
Dennis Road? Yup, that looks like Dennis road to me ;0)
karmadillo a 442 number, that'll be in Balsall Heath won't it?
@catnip Ben Goldacre's book is excellent. I've bought it as a christmas present for @mybrother
You can make an enquiry for information about an inquiry you are holding. Don't think you can say it the other way around
inquiry noun, enquiry verb isn't it?
. . . . . . . . and his doggy bags. Always brings us a doggy bag does Dave.
That's what we like about @daveharte , his marvellous sense of humour . . . . . .
I bet you do a mean Rigsby impression . . .
Of course, I'm just jealous 'cos I'm twice his size
He's only taking a breather, you mark my words.
i'm sorry, but I'm finding this "no pudding" concept of yours a bit difficult to understand
I live in BH. Have you contacted me?
That's why I walk up to the JQ every day. Goats cheese and caramelised onion on wholemeal today.
It's a shame none of your work colleagues went out for lunch isn't it? One of them might have got you a sandwich
That's a coincidence. Frost was the reason why I didn't go to the cinema this evening.
Why are you pricing up stuff you already own?
That's not a revolution, it's a reflection in the axis perpendicular to the sofa. A revolution and they'd be staring at the wall.
When it's really cold outside few things can beat ratcheting up the heating and eating a load of ice cream
Back from H&H. No comedy there tonight despite advertising in Guardian. Ironing it is then.
This is the most depressing thing that I have seen for some time http://is.gd/byrR
Curled up on sofa with a good book, a cup of hot choc and some biscuits. Hot water bottle is warming bed.
Fannying around trying to update Twitter using cURL when I should be studying
Putting the dishes in soak is not a pointless exercise that only delays me having to actually wash them up. Oh no.
Sitting on the sofa supping soup. Mafalda is not looking impressed.
Opening the shops 24 hours/day's not going to have much effect.It's not as if people would spend more if only shops were open at 4am, is it?
This afternoon I watched some of Bugsy Malone and skimmed through The Stirrer's forum. I feel a bit grubby now.
I've drunk two mugs of Blue Mountain coffee that I bought as a Chrissie pressie to myself. Whooo!! Feeling a bit buzzy now!!
I'm about to leave work for the last time this year. ho! ho! ho!
Paperwork to finish off this am and a Computers for Pupils meeting this afternoon. Shame, I wanted to go to #bsmc. Have fun y'all
sitting in a meeting listening to @daveharte sharing his wisdom
After today's scoffing - cheesecake for breakfast f'rinstance - we may have to rename the team Diabetic Birmingham
Meeting with the youth fella in a minute. Just a little bit of time to fill in my timesheets for the last 6 mont .......zzzzzzzz
Oh dear. Lastfm appears to be pushing me in the direction of what I believe to be called "intelligent house". Kill me. Kill me now.
Dear #lazyweb isn't there a website where you bung in a few ingredients and it spits out some recipe suggestions?
Having a couscous emergency. May have to rethink the stuffed pepper plans.
I'm not feeling the love much today
The Madoff Ponzi scheme: who was to know eh? http://is.gd/eGeH
i iz Nostradamus, or not http://is.gd/eBW3
Today we have experienced "wintery precipitation" apparently. I think they meant to say that it snowed.
OU work over for the day. Lying on sofa. Starting off the roasties. Listening to King Tubby. Not thinking about the ironing.
Max Beesley played keyboards with Brand New Heavies. Thanks to @editorialgirl and @regengirl for the cultural enrichment
Am interspersing college work with reading Flat Earth News (and sending random maths tweets). Any Journalist types read it?
